description:
Do you have friends or relatives in Germany? Do you want to send them text messages (SMS) from abroad? With SMS77-Client you can send cheap text messages to German cell phones starting from 0.035 € (price as of 06/2010). It is also possible, to type in the sender id as plain text, "Flash" SMS sending directly to the phones display and sending SMS to other countries (prices vary!).
Time delayed sending is in preparation. An account with SMS77.de is necessary. The developer of the app is not related to SMS77.de and is not liable for costs and undelivered messages. For current rates check: http://www.sms77.de/preise.html The app itself is in german language. Get a free account & try the online service at www.sms77.de before you buy the app.

**Update 1.3.0:
- Touchpad comatible
